title: racking my brain on this one
content:
Hello all,

I remember seeing the work of a 'street artist' (whatever that means) who painted big letters using an invented alphabet using elements inspired by Roman and what seemed like Korean influenced type. any ideas?

My google skills failed me this time unfortunately.
author: Michael Green

comments.content: If I recall correctly, he is/was an american artist

Hmm only you can recognize it - was it something like this:  
 [http://quinncreative.wordpress.com/tag/invented-alphabets/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416035828/http:/quinncreative.wordpress.com/tag/invented-alphabets/ "http://quinncreative.wordpress.com/tag/invented-alphabets/")

The forms were a lot simpler I think. H, N, O, etc...

Interesting link btw - Thank you Vladimir
